keywords.DESCRIPTION: Psionic will increase the amount of next card which deals damage to enemy or gives you Shield. Psionic won't be removed at the end of turn.
Torn creature will receive damage after the creature acts.
Shield can defend damage. Attention that when damage is defend completely by Shield , that still counts as you receive damage.
If you have Concentrated power, this card will
Enemies being stunned will not act in its next turn.
If this card remains on your hand at the end of your turn, you will receive damage equals to the amount of Overload.
